talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Follow me, kid.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Interlinked Spaces and Hearts$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(This thing didn’t exist before… Is the Garden of Time and Space all right?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Distorted Space$
The small space looks huge due to a distortion.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Stop lazing around.
Let’s go.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206 size=2 face=굴림>[Enter the Space]</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Distorted Space$
Enter the Distorted Space.

$Distorted Space$

* Only you and Velskud can enter.
* Please leave your party members for a while if you’re in a party.

$Velskud$
Let’s go.

$King Cassius$
H-have you completed w-what I asked you to d-do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Velskud... How did this happen…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Ahhh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But the Garden of Time and Space is……</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You saw it with your own eyes how he wrecked this space.
Do you think I would just lay back and do nothing about it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then what’s going to happen to this place now?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Don’t feel sorry for this place. Such a feeling never helps to resolve the situation.
Labynia has already taken control of this place.
A rift of space that even I didn’t know about has been created and connected to this place.
That happened when I can’t even connect the Nests. Saying it out loud is making me more frustrated.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It hurts me to see the Garden of Time and Space in this state...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
This is the end of the Garden of Time and Space.
There’s no more reason to keep guarding this place. That would only make this chaos worse.
I’d rather destroy it with my own hands than let that happen.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course. He said the <FONT color=#a82424>barrier</FONT> will grow weaker if this continues…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Maybe this is a blessing in disguise.
Though we lost the Garden of Time and Space, we still have the Monolith which is much more important to us.
I hope you didn’t forget what Rubinart's Apparition said.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A new barrier?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
That’s right. Rather than clinging onto the Garden of Time and Space which is already in shambles, I will create a new barrier to protect the Monolith.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I’m choked with emotion!)</FONT> Oh, Velskud…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I can no longer trust the foolhardy dragon who might as well be out of his mind.
I will protect this world myself.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then can we stop the Labyrinth now?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You’re too soft-hearted... Forget about the Garden now.
Anyway, Labynia seems to have the ability to manipulate space.
I have no idea how she earned such abilities but I’m certain she has something to do with the Labyrinth.
What just happened has confirmed my conjectures.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So our fight against the Labyrinth continues.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Stop thinking about impossible things.
You already know what has happened cannot be turned back.
All we can do is to prevent the Garden of Time and Space from being used in evil ways by people like Labynia.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I know he feels sad about this place too even though he says that.)</FONT> Okay, I will.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
We don’t know what’s going to happen in the future.
So you should get ready too. Forget about the Garden of Time and Space now.

$Distorted Space$
The space no longer looks distorted.

$King Cassius$
H-have you completed w-what I asked you to d-do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It looks like we can’t do anything about it at the moment since it’s due to the Labyrinth.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
H-have you completed w-what I asked you to d-do?
Can... can you do something about that ominous thing...?
H-hurry, answer me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh! <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Does he not know about the Labyrinth?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
L-L-Labyrinth…? (Uncle…)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Continue)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
Ehem... Your Majesty, I have explained to you before of the bizarre phenomena that have been happening recently…
You have decreed all your subjects to observe it with caution.
I hope that reminds you now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Labyrinth is quite complicated.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
Yes, I remember... The La-Labyrinth!
But is it hard to get rid of it?
Or are you just ignoring my orders?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Once a space goes out of control, it continues to divide uncontrollably.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
W-well... Then try your best to explain.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m focusing on containing the Labyrinth so it doesn’t spread.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
You’re only preventing it from spreading and you’re complaining it’s difficult?
You were not much of a talent after all.
I gave you a task to resolve and you’re here giving me excuses……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Continue)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
Yeah, you should do that at the very least.
Your Majesty, it looks like your orders cannot be completed until the Labyrinth problem is resolved.
But since there is no direct damage to the royal palace yet, why don’t you give it some time and observe it for now?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, the Garden of Time and Space is closed now so it won’t spread anymore.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
If uncle says so… I guess that’s okay...
{user_nick}, concentrate on preventing the Labyrinth from spreading like what uncle said.
Would it be fine to do nothing about the dark energy around the statue of the Goddess?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(If we don’t stop Labynia, then it will appear again...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
I will trust you.
Don’t let anything worse happen.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive reward.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Distorted Space$
The space no longer looks distorted.

$Velskud$
Labynia…

$King Cassius$
I t-trust that you, my humble subjects, will p-protect your king.

journal.title: Strange Rift
journal.contents:
Investigate the Distorted Space that has appeared at the Garden of Time and Space with Velskud.

Garden of Time and Space - ?

journal.title: Decision
journal.contents:
Help Velskud and concentrate on finding out what is going on.

Garden of Time and Space - Velskud

journal.title: At Royal Castle
journal.contents:
Return to Royal Castle and report to King Cassius.

Saint Haven - King Cassius
